sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"前进，行进，进展"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: advance, progress, proceed, move on, go
means: advance ：主要用于具体的人或物，也可指科学技术和运动等。
progress ：指按某一既定目标前进，取得发展，目的性很明确，强调经常和稳定地前进。
move on ：非正式用语，侧重从某一停止点向某地前进，但不表示前进的目的地。
go ：最常用词，含义宽泛而不确切，依上文确定其具体意思。

sentence.Network_en: His remedial teacher sees signs of progress in his reading and writing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的辅导教师发现了他在阅读和写作方面进步的迹象。

sentence.Network_en: Middle East peace talks in Washington showed signs of progress yesterday.
sentence.Network_cn: 昨天在华盛顿举行的中东和谈有了取得进展的迹象。

sentence.Network_en: Social progress is normally a matter of struggles and conflicts.
sentence.Network_cn: 社会进步通常是斗争和冲突的结果。

jx.jx_cn_mean: 进行：正在进行；在运行中

lj.lj_ly: artistic works that are in progress.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a noun): from Latin progressus 'an advance', from the verb progredi, from pro- 'forward' + gradi 'to walk'. The verb became obsolete in British English use at the end of the 17th cent. and was readopted from American English in the early 19th cent

encyclopedia.content: 《progress》是滨崎步演唱的一首歌曲，这首歌曲由中野雄太作曲，由滨崎步作词，收录在滨崎步2011mini专辑《FIVE》中。这张专辑于2011年8月31日发行。

entry.def: Progress is the process of gradually improving or getting nearer to achieving or completing something.

example.ex: The medical community continues to make progress in the fight against cancer...
example.tran: 医学界在抗癌的斗争中不断取得进步。

example.ex: The two sides made little if any progress towards agreement.
example.tran: 双方在达成协议方面的进展甚微。

entry.def: The progress of a situation or action is the way in which it develops.

example.ex: The Chancellor is  reported to have been delighted with the progress of the first day's talks...
example.tran: 据报道，总理对第一天会谈的进展表示满意。

example.ex: Ellen would keep me abreast of the progress by phone.
example.tran: 埃伦会通过电话及时向我通报进展情况。

entry.def: To progress means to move over a period of time to a stronger, more advanced, or more desirable state.

example.ex: He will visit once a fortnight to see how his new staff are progressing...
example.tran: 他会每两个星期来访一次，看看他的新员工进展如何。

example.ex: Were you surprised that his disease progressed so quickly?...
example.tran: 他的病情发展得这么快，您是否感到意外？

entry.def: If events progress, they continue to happen gradually over a period of time.

example.ex: As the evening progressed, sadness turned to rage...
example.tran: 随着夜幕逐渐降临，悲伤变成了愤怒。

example.ex: Life was hard, and it became harder as the war progressed.
example.tran: 那时候生活很艰难，并且随着战争的持续愈发艰难了。

entry.def: If you progress something, you cause it to develop.

example.ex: Very little was done to progress the case in the first 10 or so months after K was charged.
example.tran: 在K被指控后最初的10个月左右，这个案子进展缓慢。

entry.def: If something is in progress, it has started and is still continuing.

example.ex: The game was already in progress when we took our seats...
example.tran: 我们坐下来的时候，比赛已经开始了。

example.ex: The diaries are a mixture of confession, work in progress and observation.
example.tran: 这些日记里既有自白，也有当下工作记录，还有见闻评论。

means.word_mean: 1. gradual improvement or growth or development;
2. the act of moving forward toward a goal

sentences.sentence: "he listened for the progress of the troops"

means.word_mean: 2. move forward, also in the metaphorical sense;

sentences.sentence: "Resistance to the manager's plan built up quickly"
"Pressure is building up at the Indian-Pakistani border"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
stems_affixes.word_buile: aggress[v.侵略,进攻]+ive……的→adj.侵略的,好斗的,有进取心的,敢作敢为的
progress[n.进步]+ive……的→adj.进步的,先进的;前进的
ag再+gress走+ion表名词→一再往前走→进攻

stems_affixes.value_cn: [代表]大会;[美国等国的]国会,议会
stems_affixes.word_buile: con一起+gress行走,步→走到一起→代表大会
de分开+gree=gress行走,步→分开走→级别→程度,度数

stems_affixes.value_cn: 离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上
stems_affixes.word_buile: digress[v.离题]+ion表名词→n.离题, 脱轨, 扯到枝节上
e出+gress行走,步→走出→出口
in进+gress行走,步→走进
pro向前+gress走→向前走

stems_affixes.value_cn: 违反, 犯罪, [地]海侵, 海进
stems_affixes.word_buile: transgress[v.冒犯;违背]+ion表名词→n.违反, 犯罪, [地]海侵, 海进
ag再+gress走→一再往前走→进攻
di离开,偏离+gress走→走开→离题
retro向后+gress走→向后走
trans横+gress走→横着走→冒犯

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"赞同,亲…"; 2. 也有"代替"之意; 3. 表示"向前,在前;预先"; 4. 表示"很多…"

pro赞同,亲…+slavery奴隶制→adj.赞成奴隶制的

pro向前,在前;预先+min小,伸+ent……的→向前伸出的小部分→杰出的

pro很多…+flig打出+ate……的→把钱不断的打出去→挥霍的
pro很多…+fuse流→流很多→大量的
pro很多…+lif+ic……的→带来东西→多产的
pro很多…+sper希望+ous……的→希望很多→兴旺的
pro代替+louct说+or人→n. 议长;代言人
pro代替+noun名词→n.代名词
pro向前+blem抛→抛出问题
pro向前,在前;预先+cliv倾斜+ity表名词→向前倾斜
pro向前,在前;预先+fil线条+e→前面的线条
pro向前,在前;预先+gress走→向前走
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+logue说→在前面说→前言
pro向前,在前;预先+spect看→向前看→前景
pro很多…+fit=fic做→做很多→做得好→利润
pro向前,在前;预先+cure关心→关心在前→[想要]获得
pro向前,在前;预先+fess说→在前面说坦白
pro向前,在前;预先+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
pro向前,在前;预先+long长→向前拉长→延长
pro向前,在前;预先+mot动+e→向前动→促进
pro向前,在前;预先+pel推→向前推
pro向前,在前;预先+secu追随+te→追随到[法院]前面→检举;指控
pro向前,在前;预先+trud推,突出+e→向前突出
pro向前,在前;预先+vok喊+e→在[你]前面喊→激怒[你]
pro很多…+crastin明天+ate表动词→有许多明天明日复明日→拖延
pro很多…+create创造→创造很多→生儿育女
pro很多…+lifer=fer带来+ate表动词→带来很多生命→繁殖

Sentence.sentence: While the emphasis on teaching to higher, test-driven standards as set in No Child Left Behind resulted in significantly better performance in elementary(and some middle)schools, high schools for a variety of reasons seemed to have made little progress.

His main thesis is that the buzz of urban life, and the opportunities it offers for co-operation and collaboration, is what attracts people to the city, which in turn makes cities into the engines of art, commerce, science and progress.
It is a milestone in human progress
In its first encounter it might be somewhat hesitant and unassuming, but as it came to know the user it would progress to a more relaxed and intimate style.

sentences.en: Our progress was embarrassed by lots of baggage.
sentences.cn: 大量的行李使我们行进困难。

sentences.en: During these years the labour movement of the United States has made great progress.
sentences.cn: 这些年来, 美国的工人运动已取得巨大的进展。

sentences.en: The Victorian Age is often boasted of as an age of progress.
sentences.cn: 维多利亚时代常常被夸耀为进步时代。
工作在稳步地取得进展。

sentences.en: In order to progress their project smoothly, they revised the plan several times.
sentences.cn: 为了使工程能顺利进展, 他们几次修改方案。

sentences.en: She is progressing in her studies.
It became hotter and hotter as the day progressed.

jushi.english: I never dreamed that you should have made such great progress in this very short time.
jushi.chinese: 我做梦也没有想到你在这么短的时间内会取得那么大的进步。

jushi.english: Carelessness has been proved a hindrance to our progress.
jushi.chinese: 粗心已经被证明是我们前进的障碍。

jushi.english: Don't cry down the very real progress these people have made.
jushi.chinese: 不要贬低这些人取得的切实进步。
